data.text: @Delta I tried a DM but it sends me to your website.

data.text: Hats off to @delta - being treated with #kindness is why we drive an hour more to LaGuardia to fly with #DeltaAirlines too- #foodallergy customers are loyal and repeat in a world full of choices #passex #airlines #aviation 💙💙💙💙👇✈️ https://t.co/uZ4opguSmT

data.text: @Delta Looking for an update on flight #DL0838. Was supposed to arrive MSP, but due to snow is being diverted. Any further updates?
